name: surface-curvature
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Calculate curvature of surface.

Compute the curvature of the surface, using the method from:
Interactive Texture Mapping by J. Maillot, Yahia, and Verroust, 1993.
ACM-0-98791-601-8/93/008

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the surface to compute the curvature of

inputs.name: opt_mean_mean_out
inputs.description: output mean curvature: mean curvature metric

inputs.name: opt_gauss_gauss_out
inputs.description: output gaussian curvature: gaussian curvature metric

output-files.name: opt_mean_mean_out
output-files.description: output mean curvature: mean curvature metric

output-files.name: opt_gauss_gauss_out
output-files.description: output gaussian curvature: gaussian curvature metric
